mapper.select: SELECT worker.Id as ID, worker.Name as workerName,company.Id as companyId,company.Name as companyName FROM company,employ,worker WHERE worker.id=employ.Worker_id and employ.Company_id=company.Id and worker.Id=#{workerId} and company.Id!=#{belong}
SELECT `Name`,Sex,Birth,PhoneNumber,Education,Major FROM worker,apply WHERE apply.companyid=#{CompanyId} AND apply.isConsent=0 AND worker.Id=workerid
SELECT `Name`,Sex,Birth,PhoneNumber,Education,Major FROM worker,resign WHERE resign.company_id=#{CompanyId} AND resign.isConsent=0 AND worker.Id=worker_id

SELECT dossier.Evaluate from dossier WHERE dossier.Id=(SELECT MAX(dossier.id) FROM dossier,employ,worker WHERE employ.Worker_id=#{workerid1} and worker.id=#{workerid1} and dossier.Employ_id=employ.Id);

SELECT dossier.Evaluate from dossier WHERE dossier.Id=(SELECT MAX(dossier.id) FROM dossier,employ,worker WHERE employ.Worker_id=#{workerid2} and worker.id=#{workerid2} and dossier.Employ_id=employ.Id);
SELECT SUM(dossier.Late_count) FROM employ,dossier WHERE dossier.Employ_id = employ.id and employ.Worker_id=#{workerId1}
